name: The Lightkeeper (Such_Nick)
description:
You've decided to take up a job offer as a lightkeeper. You'll be there for a month, and you'll have a partner so you don't go insane. All you have to do is man the light and the foghorn, nothing could go wrong, right?

This is another shorter one, I don't even have an excuse it was kind of a half-baked idea, but I hope you enjoy it nonetheless!
